short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never miss out on miles again. With the extension you’ll get miles alerts while you shop, plus get coupons applied at checkout.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Activate miles and Loyalty Points directly from 1,000+ stores while you shop online. With the American Airlines AAdvantage® eShopping℠ button browser extension you’ll:

🛍️ Get easy-to-activate reminders: The button lets you know when to activate and earn miles and Loyalty Points as you shop at more than 1,000 stores.

💰 Enjoy savings at your fingertips: Shop savvier with coupon codes that are automatically applied at checkout.

⚖️ Compare miles offers: Shop and earn with confidence thanks to Google search results that clearly display stores’ offers of miles and Loyalty Points.

💯    Always get the best price: The button comparison-shops for you, then lets you know if a product is available for the same price or less at another store that's also offering miles and Loyalty Points. 

👀 See what else you can earn: Enjoy easy access to earning opportunities like extra miles and Loyalty Points, bonus offers, and more.

❤️ Let the miles and Loyalty Points you love come to you: Get the AAdvantage® eShopping℠ button browser extension now and get rewarded every time you shop.

By installing the AAdvantage® eShopping℠ button, you are agreeing to these terms & conditions: 
https://www.aadvantageeshopping.com/terms____.htm

Privacy Policy: https://www.aadvantageeshopping.com/privacy____.htm
